# ManagedSettingsStore.Name

**Structure**

The unique name of a store.

## Declaration

```swift
struct Name
```

## Overview

Use `ManagedSettingsStore.Name` to create distinct stores with their own settings. Initializing multiple stores with the same name will share settings.

## Initializers

- **init(_:)**: Creates a new instance with the specified string.
- **init(rawValue:)**: Creates a new instance with the specified string.

## Instance Properties

- **rawValue**: The name of the store as a `String`.

## Type Properties

- **default**: The default store name.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
